title: [Gems of the Earth]
description: Shards of colored glass dangle from the ceiling, casting a myriad of jewel tones upon the platform as sunlight shines through them.  A simple wooden counter houses two rather large chests and serves as the only furniture on this level of the store.  Sturdy-looking steps rise to the second floor in a wide spiral around a massive tree trunk.

Shards of colored glass dangle from the ceiling, glimmering like jewels amid the freestanding torches.  A simple wooden counter houses two rather large chests and serves as the only furniture on this level of the store.  Sturdy-looking steps rise to the second floor in a wide spiral around a massive tree trunk.
